name: Гель для лица Nivea Care очищающий, 225мл
ingredients: Aqua, Glycerin, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Coco-Glucoside, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, PEG-7 Glyceryl Cocoate, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Hydroxide, PEG-40 Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Benzophenone-4, Tocopheryl Acetate, Linalool, Benzyl Alcohol, Geraniol, Tocopherol, Parfum.
